summary: This is a certificate of authenticity from Amazon employee Maureen Townsel, declaring that Amazon produced authentic business records in response to a law enforcement request related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It confirms the authenticity of documents provided to the FBI.

persons.name: Maureen Townsel
persons.role: Law Enforcement Response Specialist at Amazon
persons.context: Amazon employee who signed the certificate of authenticity declaring that Amazon produced authentic documents in response to a law enforcement request regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the subject of the external case number (2018R01618) in the law enforcement request to which Amazon produced documents.

connections.description: Townsel, as an Amazon representative, certified the authenticity of documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request concerning Maxwell.

events.title: Execution of Amazon Certificate of Authenticity
events.description: Maureen Townsel executed a certificate of authenticity in Seattle, Washington, declaring that Amazon produced authentic business records in response to a law enforcement request related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Email transmission of certificate
events.description: The certificate of authenticity was transmitted via email to the FBI, referencing case number CRIM1048721 and external case number 2018R01618 for Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: NY (implied as FBI field office recipient)
keyFacts: Amazon produced documents in response to a law enforcement request related to the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation (External Case No. 2018R01618).
Maureen Townsel, an Amazon Law Enforcement Response Specialist, certified under penalty of perjury that the documents were authentic business records.
The certificate confirms the documents were created in the ordinary course of business and reflect accurate transactions, communications, and events.
The document shows law enforcement (FBI) was actively gathering evidence from corporate entities like Amazon in the Maxwell case as of early 2020.
The reference number CRIM1048721 suggests this was part of a specific criminal investigation file.
